author.name: Anthony
author.description: Web developer, author and online course instructor with Vue.js Developers

description: Webpack promises great things for Vue developers. But the range of possibilities of Webpack are also why it's so intimidating to learn. In this article, I'll give you a gentle introduction to Webpack without the jargon that may have you bewildered.
name: Jargon-Free Webpack Intro For VueJS Users
